data.title: The 7 Wonders of Crysis 3
data.meta_description: Go to GamingNexus.com for news and reviews on video games, consoles, and PCs.
data.text:
by: Nathaniel -

More On: Crysis 3

If you've followed any of Crysis 3's development, you might already know that "7 Wonders" is a reference to the seven zones the Cell Corporation has created in what used to be New York City. Now 7 Wonders also refers to a new Crysis 3 webseries called The 7 Wonders of Crysis 3.

The 7 Wonders of Crysis 3 is aiming for something cinematic in scope and to that end, filmmaker Albert Hughes (Dead Presidents, From Hell, Book of Eli) has been tapped to produce it.

Today, Crytec has released a brief introduction video to The 7 Wonders of Crysis 3.

I think you can ignore the 12/12/12 release date at the end of the video because the current release date is February 19, 2013. To learn more about Crysis 3 you can follow the jump. Also you should visit www.crysis.com, Crysis on Facebook, and Crysis on Twitter.

By pressing the button below, you are certifying that you are 18 years old or older and you are of age to view the content.
